posts.post_title: SOLD: Elberfeld portrait, Washington, Sweet Cap 350
posts.post_content:
Price is [STRIKE]$xxx[/STRIKE] $xxx delivered within the United States.

PayPal is fine. No need to "gift" your payment. (Check, cash, money order also OK and preferred).

A commitment to buy takes precedence over an ongoing negotiation. :rolleyes:

Feel free to [URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]email any questions[/URL].

Thanks,

Rob

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]wolfie51sb at aol dot com[/URL]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/otherphotos/elbr.jpg[/IMG]

Truly didn't think I was off on the price. Truly realize I might have been. This will be the only price reduction, to $xxx.

If it helps, I'll throw in a "tough to find in this grade" free of charge.

Thanks.
